results.description: Team GB's four-man bobsleigh team will receive their bronze medals from the 2014 Sochi Winter Olympics in November.
results.shortTitle: GB bobsleighers to get bronze in November
results.title: Team GB to receive 2014 Winter Olympics four-man bob bronze in November

thumbnail.altText: John Jackson, Bruce Tasker, Stuart Benson and Joel Fearon

results.description: British Olympic bobsledder Joel Fearon will compete for Switzerland for the 2019-20 season after the GB team agreed to release him on loan.
results.shortTitle: Switzerland 'loan' for GB slider Fearon
results.title: GB Olympic bobsledder Joel Fearon to join Switzerland on temporary basis

results.description: The Sigulda bobsleigh track gives tourists the same the thrills as professional racers.
results.shortTitle: Bobsleigh racing thrills for tourists
results.title: Bobsleigh racing thrills for tourists at Sigulda, Latvia

thumbnail.altText: Riding on the Sigulda bobsleigh track

results.description: Team GB bobsleigh pilot Brad Hall has been left 'devastated and saddened' by the decision to not fund their 2022 Winter Olympics campaign.
results.shortTitle: Bobsleigh pilot 'devastated' by funding decision
results.title: Team GB bobsleigh pilot Brad Hall 'devastated' by 2022 Winter Olympic funding decision

results.description: British bobsledders Brad Hall and Nick Gleeson finished fourth in their crowdfunded sled at the World Championships in Canada.
results.shortTitle: Hall & Gleeson fourth in crowdfunded sled
results.title: Crowdfunded sled helps Brad Hall & Nick Gleeson to fourth at Bobsleigh World Championships

thumbnail.altText: Brad Hall and Nick Gleeson in action earlier in the season

results.description: Britain's Corie Mapp wins overall Para-bobsleigh World Cup bronze with a sixth-place finish in the final race of the season.
results.shortTitle: Britain's Mapp wins World Cup bronze
results.title: Para-bobsleigh World Cup: Corie Mapp wins bronze for GB

results.description: British bobsleigh pilot Brad Hall hopes a crowdfunding campaign will help raise the £6,000 he needs to hire a two-man sled for March's World Championships.
results.shortTitle: Hall launches crowdfunding campaign
results.title: Brad Hall: Bobsleigh pilot launches crowdfunding appeal to raise money to hire a sled

results.description: A Russian court rules Alexandr Zubkov will be classed as an Olympic champion in Russia, despite being stripped of his gold medals by the IOC for doping offences.
results.shortTitle: Court rules Zubkov a champion in Russia
results.title: Alexandr Zubkov to keep Olympic titles in Russia despite IOC ruling

results.description: Britain's Mica McNeill and Montell Douglas miss out on a medal by 0.04 seconds at the Bobsleigh World Cup in Germany.
results.shortTitle: GB pair just miss out on World Cup medal
results.title: Bobsleigh World Cup: Mica McNeill & Montell Douglas finish fourth

results.description: British bobsleigh athletes will miss the season-opening World Cup races in Sigulda, Latvia, this weekend as result of UK Sport's funding cut.
results.shortTitle: GB bobsleigh to miss World Cup opener
results.title: British bobsleigh athletes to miss World Cup opener because of funding cuts

thumbnail.altText: British bobsleigh athletes in action at the Winter Olympics

results.description: UK Sport is accused of "bullying" national governing bodies with threats over public funding by two former board directors of the British Bobsleigh and Skeleton Association.
results.shortTitle: UK Sport accused of bullying over funding
results.title: UK Sport accused of 'bullying' over funding by ex-BBSA directors

results.description: British bobsleigher Bruce Tasker announces his retirement as an athlete after "a ridiculously fun few years".
results.shortTitle: Bobsleigher Tasker announces retirement
results.title: Bruce Tasker: Team GB bobsleigher announces retirement

results.description: Winter Olympian Mica Moore will take a break from bobsleigh after deciding to return to university.
results.shortTitle: Mica Moore to take bobsleigh break
results.title: Mica Moore: Winter Olympian to take bobsleigh break

thumbnail.altText: Mica Moore and Mica Mcneill celebrate at the 2018 Winter Games

results.description: Skeleton will receive £7m of UK Sport funding in the lead-up to the 2022 Winter Olympics after several BBSA board members step down.
results.shortTitle: UK Sport confirms skeleton funding
results.title: Skeleton: UK Sport confirms funding after BBSA board members step down

results.description: The International Paralympic Committee (IPC) decides not to include Sailing at the 2024 Paralympic Games in Paris.
results.shortTitle: Sailing & bobsleigh fail in Paralympic bid
results.title: Paralympics: Sailing and bobsleigh fail in bids for inclusion

results.description: British Bobsleigh and Skeleton's entire board must stand down and re-apply for their jobs as a condition of £7m of funding from UK Sport, the BBC understands.
results.shortTitle: Bobsleigh chiefs must step down if sport is to get funding
results.title: Bobsleigh chiefs must step down if sport is to get funding from UK Sport

results.description: The International Olympic Committee has announced seven new events will be included in the Winter Olympics in Beijing in 2022.
results.shortTitle: Seven new events for Beijing 2022
results.title: Beijing 2022: IOC announces seven new events for Winter Olympics

results.description: Funding for the Beijing 2022 Olympic and Paralympic cycle is a "good news story" for winter sports despite £8m cuts, says UK Sport.
results.shortTitle: Beijing funding a 'good news story'
results.title: UK Sport chief Liz Nicholl says Beijing 2022 winter sport funding a 'good news story'

results.description: British bobsleigh pilot Brad Hall hopes UK Sport recognises GB's ability to "win many medals" when its funding plan is announced on Monday.
results.shortTitle: 'We hope UK Sport see our potential'
results.title: UK Sport funding: British bobsleigh pilot Brad Hall hopes 'potential' is recognised

thumbnail.altText: Brad Hall pilots GB's four-man bobsleigh at PyeongChang 2018

results.description: The BBSA says it is "extremely disappointed" to be found responsible for the crash in which Serita Shone fractured her spine in 2011.
results.shortTitle: British Bobsleigh 'responsible' for crash
results.title: Serita Shone wins crash case against British Bobsleigh & Skeleton Association
